content:
Announcing SUSHI 0.12.6 with the following bug fixes and minor enhancements:

  • Honors canonical URLs that are overridden using ^url (#380)
  • Prohibits extensions from declaring non-extensions as parents (#387, #388)

For details, see the Release Notes.
To be clear, this isn't the IG integration version...
It is not. That will be SUSHI 0.13.0-beta.1.
We just noticed that we had bug fixes in the beta that should also probably be released in the non-beta stream.
